application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Partial approval of details pursuant to condition 5 part C (external doors), part D (rear extension materials) and part E (fire surround) of listed building consent reference: P2022/0534/LBC, granted upon appeal ref: APP/V5570/Y/22/3302581 dated 22/12/2022 for Erection of part single, part two storey rear extension (following removal of existing extension); alterations to front entrance including reinstatement of stone paving; replacement of front and rear sash/UPVC windows with timber framed single glazed sash windows and associated internal alterations


Erection of part single, part two-storey rear extension (following removal of existing extension); and associated alterations internally and externally.
